meanings.definition: A person not in the armed services or the police force.
meanings.sent1: The civilian helped the injured person on the street.
meanings.sent2: The city was full of civilian workers going about their day.
meanings.sent3: The civilian decided to play superhero for a day and help with traffic.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ants, the civilian is the one who brings food to the colony.
meanings.sent5: The civilian's kindness towards strangers made a lasting impact.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to civil life, citizens, or community affairs.
meanings.sent1: The civilian meeting discussed ways to improve the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The civilian population was eager to participate in the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent3: The civilian cat seemed to be the unofficial mayor of the street.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and welcoming as a civilian handshake.
meanings.sent5: The civilian atmosphere of the park made everyone feel at ease.
